name: Roll Maze
description:
In a universe of toys a little ball try to escape, through different doors inside a castle, each level will take it to different places trying to find the exit.

Get 3 stars in each level to acquire powers and change your appearance.

Open all doors to solve all mysteries.

Explore the entire universe to know the truth.

Controls:

  • Left Stick: character movement controls and menu options.
  • Right Stick: controls the camera.
  • X button: jump and select the action from the menu.
  • Menu / Start button: Pause the game and activate the menu.

Features:

  • 3 worlds.
  • 30 levels.
  • 90 stars.
  • 10 skins and different powers.

Requirements:

  • Windows 7 or higher
  • 2Gb of RAM
  • DiretX 9 compatible card
  • 500MB hard disk space
  • Xbox controller or gamepad

Roll maze is our second video game and we want everybody to try it and have fun with it.

Hope you really enjoy playing it because we really enjoy creating it. Its a platform game of a lost ball in a world of toys.

This game was made for Apple TV, iOS, Windows, Xbox One, and in the future will release on Android.

Xbox Controller or gamepad is required!
